message: Hello Bob! I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I'm confident it would be a great asset to you. I'm starting with a price of $18000. Let me know your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Would you be willing to meet me there?

Bob, thanks for your offer. While I appreciate your interest, $14000 is a bit too low for me right now. I'm willing to come down to $16000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $16000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $13500?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  I'm willing to come down to $15000, but that's my final offer.  This is a fair price for a product of this quality.  Let's make a deal.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $15000 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to meet me at $13000?

Bob, I'm starting to think we might not be able to reach an agreement.  I'm willing to go down to $14500, but that's my absolute final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $14500 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to meet me at $13200?
